H0.text: The Australian city of Perth, the capital of Western Australia, is on which river. Murray River

H1.text: The Australian city of Perth, the capital of Western Australia, is on which river. Fitzroy River

H2.text: The Australian city of Perth, the capital of Western Australia, is on which river. Gascoyne River

H3.text: The Australian city of Perth, the capital of Western Australia, is on which river. Swan

A4.text: The Swan River runs through the metropolitan area of Perth, Western Australia's capital and largest city.

A5.text: The Swan River estuary flows through the city of Perth.
